languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 bonus to Willpower until the end of combat.
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 bonus to Willpower until the end of combat.
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación acumulable{/g} de +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación acumulable{/g} de +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 每当装备者击杀敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点。此效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者击杀敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点。此效果可叠加，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi, il reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} de +5 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi, il reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} de +5 jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Wann immer der Träger einen Feind tötet, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen sich aufaddierenden +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger einen Feind tötet, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen sich aufaddierenden +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が敵を殺した場合はいつでも、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が +5累積される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が敵を殺した場合はいつでも、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が +5累積される。

languages.text: Убивая противников, персонаж получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5, который сохраняется до конца боя.
